nutrients:
Course Book
KEC Book
Handwritten Notes
PDF Notes
description: Bachelors of Science in Computer Science and Information Technology (Bsc.CSIT) is a four-year course affiliated to Tribhuvan University designed for the students with all sorts of knowledge in the field of Information Technology and Computing. It provides the students with adequate theoretical and practical knowledge which enable students to participate in solving the complex problem of the IT industry. Below, we have provided the full syllabus of Bachelors of Science in Computer Science and Information Technology (Bsc.CSIT) for First Semester, Second Semester, Third Semester, Fourth Semester, Fifth Semester, Sixth Semester, Seventh Semester and Eighth Semester. You can download each subject syllabus of Bachelors of Science in Computer Science and Information Technology program from here.
